response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is an opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a rate that offers significant savings compared to the market value. I look forward to discussing how this product can enhance your operations. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 12000}
